channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Internet collapses in Iran amid protests over economic crisis
item.description: Internet monitoring firms and experts say Iran’s internet has almost completely shut down, as protests spread through major cities.

item.title: Odinn Omnia is the fastest portable PC you'll see in 2026 — it weighs 37kg, but hey, it has 4 Nvidia GPUs, 2 AMD CPUs, 1PB SSD storage, and a 24-inch 4K monitor
item.description: The Odinn Omnia is a 37kg mobile PC packing data center-level hardware, including four Nvidia GPUs, dual AMD CPUs, and 1PB storage.

item.title: Yet another Whoop rival has appeared at CES 2026 — this time from AI gym company Speediance
item.description: CES has no shortage of new health tech — there are even multiple Whoop-style fitness trackers.

item.title: EU antitrust regulators to decide on Google's Wiz acquisition
item.description: The European Commission will either approve or reject Google's acquisition of Wiz in February.

item.title: Le Samsung Odyssey G6 OLED, un écran PC 27″ et 240 Hz hyper réactif, est soldé à -30 %
item.description: Le Samsung Odyssey G6 OLED est un écran PC dédié au gaming qui profite d'une fiche technique riche, à retrouver soldé pour 474,99 euros sur Cdiscount, au lieu de 699,99 euros au départ.

item.title: Most dubious uses of AI at CES 2026
item.description: You can't shake a stick without hitting an AI gadget at CES this year, with artificial smarts now embedded in just about every wearable, screen, and appliance across the show floor, not to mention the armies of AI companions, toys, and robots. But those are just the beginning. We've seen AI pop up in much […]

item.title: OpenAI to acquire the team behind executive coaching AI tool Convogo
item.description: OpenAI is acquiring the team behind executive coaching AI tool Convogo in an all-stock deal, adding to the firm's M&A spree.

item.title: Microsoft is now integrating shopping directly into Copilot
item.description: Have you ever wanted to save approximately three seconds and two mouse clicks when shopping online? Microsoft has something special just for you. The company just introduced something called Copilot Checkout at the NRF 2026 retail conference. This is exactly what it sounds like. It's a shopping assistant embedded within Copilot. The feature is rolling out now in the US and integrates with PayPal, Shopify, Stripe and Etsy. It lets people complete purchases directly inside of Copilot without having to withstand the grueling experience of being redirected to a retailer's website. Participating pa...

item.title: Anduril’s Palmer Luckey thinks the future of tech is in the past
item.description: Luckey, who initially made his fortune in VR and now runs the defense contractor Anduril, and Ohanian both seemed to agree: Stuff was better in the old days.

item.title: Website Plays the Lottery Every Second, Puts the Pitiless Nature of Probability on Full Display
item.description: But you will definitely get lucky.

item.title: ‘Freddy’s Dead’ Originally Ended With a New Freddy Krueger Emerging
item.description: Rachel Talalay, director of the sixth 'Nightmare on Elm Street' movie, filmed but cut the original ending.

item.title: Everyone on TikTok hates January
item.description: That first week back to work is the ‘worst aesthetic ever,’ users say. If you had a severe case of the Sunday Scaries last weekend, you are not alone. It’s a sentiment many have been sharing online.

item.title: American Airlines is making inflight Wi-Fi free—but only for some travelers
item.description: The rollout begins on certain aircraft types and expands through spring as new equipment comes online. American Airlines will begin offering free, high-speed Wi-Fi on flights beginning this month. The airline made the announcement this week in a press release, explaining that the service will extend to around two million flights in 2026. However, not all fliers will receive the perk....

item.title: Une étoile déchirée, un trou noir affamé : voilà le scénario terrifiant
item.description: Le bestiaire des monstres cosmiques vient d'accueillir un nouveau venu qui se manifeste par des explosions cosmiques d'une puissance inédite. Il s'agit d'une variante du scénario de la destruction d'une étoile par des forces de marée d'un trou noir supermassif. L'explosion peut alors libérer...

item.title: Disney+ is launching short-form videos this year
item.description: The move comes as Disney launched a personalized vertical video feed in the ESPN app last year.

item.title: The MAGA-approved video of an ICE killing
item.description: The clips are filmed from different angles. Some are zoomed in, making them indecipherably grainy, and others are slowed down. Some are 20 seconds while others are longer, sandwiched by commentary from users on social media platforms like X, Bluesky, Reddit, and TikTok. Each video - depicting the moment an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent […]...

item.title: I can't get over this goofy, long-necked 'cyber pet' robot at CES
item.description: Cute, alien-inspired companion robots are a fixture at CES, but have I ever seen one with a furry telescoping neck that's also warm to the touch? No, I can't say I have before this year. OlloBot — which had possibly the cutest booth at CES 2026 — is a home robot and "cyber pet" that looks something like if you put ET's head on a penguin's body, plus a splash of fur and color. Its face is essentially a large tablet that displays its expressions, pictures and videos, and allows it to communicate with people in the home. OlloBot speaks its own language, but will put text on the screen when it has...

item.title: La Switch 2 n’aurait pas connu le succès espéré en France
item.description: Malgré un lancement canon, la Switch 2 n'a pas connu le même succès que la Switch 1 durant son premier trimestre des fêtes, du moins aux États-Unis et en Europe. La situation en France serait même particulièrement difficile.

item.title: The most bizarre tech announced so far at CES 2026
item.description: From an AI panda pet to an anime girl hologram for your desk, here are the wildest products at CES 2026.

item.title: Les Galaxy Buds 3 se retrouvent dans un pack malin avec un chargeur sans fil de 15 W pour moins de 100 €
item.description: Les Galaxy Buds 3 ne sont pas les fleurons de la gamme de Samsung, mais ils possèdent de nombreux arguments qui évitent de pousser à l'achat des versions Pro. En plus, les soldes d'hiver les font passer de 149,99 euros à 99,99 euros sur la Fnac, avec un chargeur sans fil de 15 W.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra could finally catch up to OnePlus with a key battery upgrade
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra has been tipped to get 60W wired charging – which would be a big step towards catching up with Chinese phone makers like Xiaomi and OnePlus.

item.title: You can get a four-pack of Samsung SmartTag 2 trackers for just $45
item.description:
Samsung SmartTag 2 trackers are back on sale if you're willing to pick up a bundle. Woot has a four-pack down to just $45, which undercuts the previous all-time low we’ve seen on Amazon ($55) by $10. That's a discount of 55 percent from the retail price of $100. It's a compelling opportunity to stock up if you're already in Samsung's ecosystem.
We named the SmartTag 2 the best Bluetooth tracker for Samsung devices. The companion SmartThings Find app is easy to use, showing locations on a Google Maps-based interface. Much like Apple's Find My network, the location of a SmartTag is pinpointed ...

item.title: How to Protest Safely in the Age of Surveillance
item.description: Law enforcement has more tools than ever to track your movements and access your communications. Here’s how to protect your privacy if you plan to protest.

item.title: L’usage de l’IA par France Travail ? Globalement positif mais « perfectible », selon la Cour des comptes
item.description: Les magistrats de la plus haute juridiction financière se sont penchés, pour la première fois, sur l'utilisation par France Travail (ex-Pôle emploi) de l'intelligence artificielle. L'usage de cette technologie est globalement positif, même si certaines pratiques, notamment relatives à la gestion et à la protection des données, restent perfectibles.

item.title: Honda and Sony just teased a second SUV at CES 2026, but their Chinese rivals are already racing ahead
item.description: Sony Honda Mobility takes the wraps off its SUV prototype, despite not yet delivering its debut electric sedan.

item.title: Illinois health department exposed over 700,000 residents’ personal data for years
item.description: The security lapse exposed personal information belonging to residents who received state benefits.

item.title: UK Government department to use AI in benefits claims
item.description: The DWP wants to spend £23.4 million on a new AI system to route benefits calls and free up human agents' time.

item.title: Nvidia’s reportedly asking Chinese customers to pay upfront for its H200 AI chips
item.description: Nvidia is now requiring its customers in China to pay upfront in full for its H200 AI chips even as approval stateside and from Beijing remains uncertain.

item.title: The GE Profile Smart Fridge stops you from buying too much kale
item.description: If you’ve ever bought a bag of spinach only to come home and realize you already had a bag of spinach, you may appreciate this fridge. I had a chance to check out the GE Profile Smart Fridge with Kitchen Assistant at CES and was surprised to find I kinda wanted one. To be perfectly honest, most attempts I’ve seen at the show to “stick some AI in it” are at best amusing but usually completely unnecessary. Here, though, the AI has a purpose. After seeing how the autofill water dispenser worked, I asked the GE Appliance reps how easy it was to change the fridge’s water filter. Jason May, a GE Ap...

item.title: Windows 11's next major update is only coming to a few laptops – but that could be a blessing in disguise
item.description: Windows 11 26H1 is confirmed as exclusively for Snapdragon X2 laptops – other PCs will have to wait for 26H2 later this year.

item.title: The first privately funded space-based telescope is in the works
item.description: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt and his wife, Wendy, could help make history with a new project unveiled on Wednesday, the Lazuli Space Observatory. As reported by Science, the telescope was announced at a meeting of the American Astronomical Society this week and could be the largest privately funded space telescope in history thanks to […]

item.title: NASA delays spacewalk due to a 'medical concern' with a crew member
item.description: NASA has postponed an International Space Station (ISS) spacewalk that was scheduled for Thursday. "The agency is monitoring a medical concern with a crew member that arose Wednesday afternoon aboard the orbital complex," the agency wrote. On Thursday, NASA added that ending Crew-11's mission early was on the table.The unnamed crew member is stable, according to NASA. Space News notes that Kimiya Yui of the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) was heard on an open comms channel on Wednesday requesting a private medical conference with a flight surgeon. However, those requests are routine ...

item.title: It took guts for Dell to admit its mistake, here's how XPS will make its big comeback in 2026
item.description: When Dell made the decision to kill off its XPS laptop name last year, it felt like a big mistake. We said so, in fact, multiple times. But at CES 2026, the company is righting its past wrongs by resurrecting the iconic laptop brand — and this time, this decision feels like the right move both for Dell as a whole and its flagship consumer devices.Even more than the words the letters XPS are meant to represent (Extreme Performance Systems), over the last decade, Dell’s signature laptop brand stood for excellent design, quality engineering and top notch performance. And it was precisely those la...

item.title: Antarctica’s Oldest, Largest Iceberg Is Turning an Ominous Blue Color
item.description: The iceberg could completely disintegrate within days or weeks, scientists say.

item.title: Les jouets Nintendo My Mario arrivent enfin en France : ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Après un premier lancement au Japon, la gamme de jouets et d'applications Nintendo pour les enfants en bas âge arrive en France.

item.title: Forget the RAM crisis: the best laptops of CES 2026 have made me excited for the future
item.description: We've spent the week at CES 2026 in Las Vegas checking out the future of laptops – and these are the most exciting products we've seen.

item.title: Xbox confirms Developer Direct 2026 showcase for later this month — here are the games to expect
item.description: Xbox has confirmed its Developer Direct 2026 showcase will take place on January 22 and feature brand new trailers for some of its most anticipated games, including Fable and Forza Horizon 6.

item.title: Microsoft will put buy buttons directly in Copilot
item.description: Microsoft is launching a new feature in Copilot that will allow you to make purchases during conversations with the AI chatbot. Now, when you're asking for suggestions about what kind of sneakers you should buy, Copilot can surface a checkout option for the product you choose directly inside the app. An example shared by Microsoft […]

item.title: Un film 100 % IA qui cartonne ? Le patron de Roku y croit dur comme fer
item.description: Un « vrai » film 100 % généré par IA peut-il réellement connaître le succès ? Pour le patron de Roku, c'est du sûr et certain, et cela arrivera dans les trois prochaines années, prédit-il.

item.title: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy deftly balances teen drama with intergalactic intrigue
item.description: Star Trek is in a weird place right now. Less than three years ago we were living in a golden age with five shows on the air, all with different styles and intended audiences. But the universe rapidly contracted, with Picard ending while four other shows were cut short. Strange New Worlds still has another two seasons left, sure, but even that final season got truncated. As it stands, there’s only one project with a firm future right now, and that’s a brand-new show, Starfleet Academy, premiering January 15 on Paramount+.How this show is received could very well determine the future of Star T...

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : les premières offres sont en ligne, voici les meilleurs deals à saisir
item.description: Après les fêtes, la nouvelle année s'est installée en introduisant avec elle les soldes d'hiver ! Cette édition promet de belles affaires à ne pas manquer pour s’équiper à petit prix avant la hausse annoncée en 2026. Comptez sur Frandroid pour vous relayer uniquement les meilleures offres.

item.title: Snowflake announces its intent to buy observability platform Observe
item.description: Snowflake is bolstering its data stack to make the platform better suited to the sheer volume of data produced by AI agents.

item.title: 2026 Movie Anniversaries: All the Biggest Genre Movies Celebrating Milestones This Year
item.description: 'Frankenstein,' 'Carrie,' 'Raiders of the Lost Ark,' 'Independence Day,' and more sci-fi, fantasy, and horror movies with big anniversaries coming up.

item.title: Forget fitness trackers — external brains are the hot new wearables at CES this year
item.description: We've run out of ways to improve our fitness — so wearables at CES are now taking the strain off our brains.

item.title: Satechi’s new Slim EX keyboards have a replaceable battery
item.description: Satechi is launching a new pair of wireless keyboards with a rechargeable battery designed for easy replacement. Despite their ultrathin profiles, the compact Slim EX1 and full-size Slim EX3 both stow the removable battery in a compartment on their undersides. A wireless keyboard with an easily replaceable and rechargeable battery is hard to come by, […]...

item.title: Arsenal vs Liverpool Live Streams: How to Watch Premier League 2025-26 From Anywhere in the World
item.description: All the ways to watch Arsenal vs Liverpool live streams online and from anywhere, as the title-chasing Gunners welcome the champions to the Emirates.

item.title: Why it took years to design the Girl Scouts’ new Exploremore cookie
item.description: That Girl Scout cookie you devoured in five seconds took a lot of testing to make. Inside Girl Scouts’ headquarters in New York City and its two licensed bakeries, a team of trend forecasters, marketers, and food scientists spend years cooking up its next iconic cookie. Now, fans of the annual cookie sale are about to get a taste of what the Girl Scouts of the USA (GSUSA) team has been baking behind closed doors....

item.title: Cloudflare is battling La Liga, Spain’s elite soccer league, over accusations of illegal content
item.description: The Spanish league says U.S-based content delivery network Cloudflare isn’t doing enough to block illegal broadcasts of its soccer matches. Once the ball starts rolling in the Spanish league, the game is on for some 50 analysts who start looking for signs of online piracy.They scan websites, social media posts, IPTV platforms and streaming portals in search of illegal broadcasts of La Liga matches.The trained analysts identify the pirated content and take the steps needed to take them off air, including notifying Internet intermediaries like Cloudflare, the U.S.-based company whose content-del...

item.title: I tried Even Realities' G2 display smart glasses, and now I can't stop thinking about their minimalist approach
item.description: I took the Even G2 display smart glasses for a test drive, and I was impressed with their simplicity, style, and power.

item.title: SwitchBot's new gadget clips to your collar and records your conversations, so you'll never have to pay attention ever again
item.description: The 'AI MindClip' wants to become your second brain.

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures tablettes tactiles à acheter en 2026 ?
item.description: La bonne vieille tablette tactile trouve toujours sa place dans nos foyers. Pour savoir laquelle choisir, de la petite tablette pas chère aux iPad Pro les plus puissants, vous êtes au bon endroit. Voici notre sélection des meilleures tablettes du marché.

item.title: I’ve tried BMW’s latest iDrive system – and its Amazon Alexa Plus voice assistant is a game-changer
item.description: BMW's UX boss takes us on a deep dive tour of iDrive with Amazon Alexa Plus.

item.title: Cdiscount se démarque en multipliant les codes promos pour les soldes : le TOP 10 des offres à retenir
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver sont aussi chez Cdiscount, et c’est le moment idéal pour craquer sur un nouveau produit Tech sans se ruiner. En plus des remises déjà généreuses, l’e-commerçant ajoute deux codes promo exclusifs pour faire encore baisser la note. On vous a sélectionné les meilleures offres à ne surtout pas manquer.

item.title: LMT stock: Lockheed Martin benefits from Trump’s eye-popping budget, ‘dream military’ comments
item.description: Defense stocks are surging after President Trump called for a massive $1.5 trillion defense budget in 2027. It’s a dream come true for investors with heavy defense stock holdings. On Thursday, defense stocks surged after President Trump called for a massive $1.5 trillion defense budget next year.

item.title: VoLTE, 3G, itinérance Orange, satellite, 5G sur l’Apple Watch, 5G SA : le directeur réseau de Free répond à toutes nos questions
item.description: C'est une mise au point nécessaire. Alors que certains abonnés évoquent des problèmes d'appels chez Free Mobile, nous avons interrogé Pascal Mayeux, directeur du cœur de réseau. On en a profité pour poser plein d'autres questions.

item.title: Vulnerability in Identity Service Engine with exploit code patched by Cisco
item.description: A PoC is out there, but there's no evidence of abuse yet.

item.title: CES 2026 : Laifen dévoile la brosse à dents qui promet un nettoyage « digne d’un dentiste » [Sponso]
item.description: Présent à Las Vegas pour l’édition 2026 du CES, Laifen a profité de l’occasion pour dévoiler sa fiche de route pour l’année à venir. Au programme, une refonte de sa ligne de produits dédiée au bien-être personnel, et plus particulièrement, une version Pro de sa brosse à dents électrique, la Laifen Wave.
